name: insomnia
effect: This Pokémon cannot be asleep. This causes rest to fail altogether. If a Pokémon is asleep and acquires this ability, it will immediately wake up; this includes when regaining a lost ability upon leaving battle. This ability functions identically to vital spirit in battle.

flavor_text.sun_moon: The Pokémon is suffering from insomnia and cannot fall asleep.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: The Pokémon is suffering from insomnia and cannot fall asleep.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: The Pokémon is suffering from insomnia and cannot fall asleep.
